title: हुरूआ बजुरूआ | Oorua Baturua by Surjeet Singh Patyal
description: Traditional folk song from Nirmand, Kullu, sung as dialogue between a lady and her son. The whole album is a treasure trove of folk songs from the region.

title: Bhava Rupiye by Piyush Raj
description: Kullvi folk song - sung about the eternal beauty of a woman.

title: Kindi Chale Bathade by Vicky Chauhan
description: Modern party banger by Vicky Chauhan! Went quite viral recently - has some great dance moves.

title: The Unknown Craftsman by Amit Dutta
description: Towards the end of the eighth century, an architect journeys across the lower Himalayas in search of the perfect site for constructing a temple, not merely as a place of worship but as a monumental record crystallizing the collective accomplishment of a civilization.
